summary: This bill, the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA) Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes the NTIA and makes several changes to its structure and operations. It reauthorizes appropriations, updates the title of the head of the NTIA from Assistant Secretary to Under Secretary, and establishes two new offices within the NTIA: the Office of Spectrum Management and the Office of International Affairs. The bill also streamlines reporting requirements and makes technical and conforming amendments to various existing laws related to telecommunications.
